fields.summary: iOS: View inside popover does not fill available space
fields.environment:
Ti version 3.1.3.v20130908095038, 
iOS 6 and 7
OS: X OS 10.8.4,
Xcode: Version 4.6.3 (4H1503)

comments.body:
How can this be a priority None? Are You seriously suggesting we release our Apps with this bug?
The problem also exists on IOS7.
We use the Titanium platform because it's native, but with this bug it don't look very native.
I'm sorry but I will be very disappointed if the next update doesn't include a fix for this.

I hope the ticket update is just a mistake.
I released my latest App update with an older SDK because of this bug, accepting other problems for the meantime.

same thing here, I had to release an update with TiSDK 3.1.2. I can't update to xcode 5 because not all of my modules support it yet. So, until everything will work smooth on xcode 5, I have to stick with xcode 4.

Hey guys,
we go from Community bugs to Mobile/Cloud or so. We reset the priority, so Platform will decide which priority should have.

Thanks for letting us your concerns about this. 

Best,

Mauro

this is what happens when I use your workaround

!http://i.imgur.com/aKlRLhM.png!

it still doesn't work to me.

Workaround works on iOS 6 but not on iOS7.
This is a high priority for us.
